english.segment1: my wings don't sail me to the sky. on my own these wings won't fly. Jesus told me so. still, i'm not so sure that i know
english.segment2: can't find no rest for my soul. can't find no rest on my own. Jesus told me so. still, i'm not so sure that i know
english.segment3: Chorus: man, the trouble is. we don't know who we are instead. man, the trouble is. we don't know who we are instead
english.segment4: i keep runnin' the other way. my heart ain't built to stay. my heart ain't built to stay. and the world just ain't that way
english.segment6: we don't know who we are instead
english.segment7: my heart ain't built to stay. i said, my heart, well, it ain't built to stay. Jesus told me so
